message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $11,500 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but $11,500 is already a competitive price for a product of this quality. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,750 for the product. Can we meet at this price?
Bob, you're clearly serious about this product and I want to see us reach a deal. How about we split the difference and settle on $10,875? That's my final offer.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $10,875, so I'll offer $10,625. Can we do business at this price?
